name: Citadel of mental abstraction: a Chris Wright
description: Ok, this is another tribute map for a mapper which marked this year, as like as gama-dm (gamarra) and ruba's daffieduk.wad remake, this time our champion is the unstoppable speedmapper Chris Wright. I made this following his own mapping canons (abstract theme, lots of curve linedefs, usage of almost every texture in doom 2 stock) and adding few stuff of my mapping style.
